### 

name: deborah "debbie" lynn thompson

age: 72

location: manchester, new hampshire (6th most populous city in new england)

income: $55,000

occupation: retired from a part-time secretarial job at a local church, previously worked at a private medical firm before retiring full-time. 

homeownership: owns a two-bedroom, one-bathroom, single-family home worth about $250,000, with a mortgage that was paid off 10 years ago.

marital status: married to harold thompson, a 74-year-old retired mechanic.

education: an associate's degree in secretarial administration from new hampshire technical institute, earned in 1975.

geographic location neighborhood: lives in a quiet suburban neighborhood near a park with easy access to grocery stores and community services. her neighborhood is predominantly composed of middle-class families and retirees, with a mix of single-family homes and apartments.
